snippet.title: 🎉 Dance Eden is now live on Steam Early Access! 🎉
snippet.description:
🎉 Dance Eden is now live on Steam Early Access! 🎉
🕺 Multiplayer Fun: Dive into our real-time multiplayer XR dance experience! Dance together with friends and players worldwide.
🎶 Music & Dance: Groove to 40 energetic songs with 80 original choreographies, featuring styles like choreography, hip-hop, jazz, and fitness dance.
🏠 Immersive Environments: Explore 3 unique environments:
- Personal Room: Invite friends over to chat and dance.
- Practice Studio: Perfect your moves in a beginner-friendly space.
- Plaza Stage: Unlock this advanced venue to showcase your performance.
👗 Customization: Express yourself with a high level of Avatar customization. Choose from a variety of stylish outfits, accessories, and makeup to define your unique look.
Come and join the dance party! 💃🕺
🔗Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2934620/DANCE_EDEN/
👉 Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/danceeden
#DanceEden #SteamEarlyAccess #XR #DanceGame #Multiplayer #GamingCommunity
